snippet: FLEMISTER--Mrs. Beatrice Benjamin, died on March 17, 2016 at age 109. Her son, Rev. Dr. Carl E. Flemister, and daughter, Mrs. Barbara Flemister Mullen, made the announcement on behalf of five generations of family members. A celebration of Mrs. Flemister's life will be held at 11:00am on March 22, 2016 at Bethesda Baptist Church, New Rochelle. In lieu of flowers, contributions can be made in Mrs. Flemister's name to American Baptist Churches Metropolitan New York, 475 Riverside Dr, NYC 10115, Flemister House, 527 W. 22 St, NYC 10011, and the Manhattan Country School, 7 East 96 St, NYC 10128. 1/3
